item.title: Version 1.0.1
item.description:
We update Hack Rides app frequently to improve your services and customer success.
- We've updated some text messages to make things clearer for the passengers. - We've added "Latest destinations" on the search screen. - We've made it easier to book for a friend by adding a "My location" option.
Hope you appreciate our app and we want to be part of your success. We love to hear your feedback or questions, please contact us hackrides.com
